com.example.demo

Class PropertyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.demo.PropertyController

  • @RestController
class PropertyController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for Property objects.
    Author:
    Max Minard, Matthew Martin

    • Method Detail

      • createProperty

        @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                path="/property/new",
                consumes="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public Property createProperty(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                              Property property)
        API method to receive POST Http request and creates a new property with the given property information. Checks if property has a valid landlord. Saves the property to the server database. Returns created property.
        Parameters:
        property - New property information
        Returns:
        property Created property

      • getAllProperties

        @RequestMapping(path="/properties/all",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public java.util.Collection<Property> getAllProperties(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        API method to receive GET Http request and retrieve all property information on the server database. Returns all property information.
        Parameters:
        model - Model to use
        Returns:
        propertyList List of all properties

      • getProperty

        @RequestMapping(path="/properties/{id_property}",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public Property getProperty(@PathVariable(value="id_property")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.Integer id_property,
                                                                                                                         org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        API method to receive GET Http request and retrieve information of given property. Returns property information with given property id.
        Parameters:
        id_property - Property ID to find
        model - Model to use
        Returns:
        property Found property

      • getLandlordsProperties

        @RequestMapping(path="/properties/landlord/{id_landlord}",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public java.util.Collection<Property> getLandlordsProperties(@PathVariable(value="id_landlord")
                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.Integer id_landlord,
                                                                                                                                                                   org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        API method to receive GET Http request and retrieve information of all properties owned by given landlord. Returns list of properties owned by landlord with given landlord id.
        Parameters:
        id_landlord - Landlord id
        model - Model to use
        Returns:
        landlordProperties List of properties

      • getVacantProperties

        @RequestMapping(path="/properties/vacant",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public java.util.Collection<Property> getVacantProperties(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        API method to receive GET Http request and retrieve information of all properties with a vacant living status. Returns information of all unoccupied properties from server database.
        Parameters:
        model - Model to use
        Returns:
        landlordProperties List of properties

      • updateProperty

        @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                path="/properties/update/{id_property}",
                consumes="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public Property updateProperty(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                 Property property,
                                                                                                                                                                                 @PathVariable(value="id_property")
                                                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.Integer id_property)
        API method to receive POST Http request and update the information of a property with the given property id. Returns the updated information of the property from the server database.
        Parameters:
        property - Property to update
        id_property - Property ID
        Returns:
        property Updated property
